content:
It's been a while since you picked up your fishing rod,
When I walk by the water,
I miss watching your graceful casting performances.
info: 闲聊-玩家长期未进行的行为反馈-1003乐福_单一闲聊

content:
Director! Why don't we put on a thrilling show with the shellfish tongs?
"Action, come ashore!" I can't wait to see it!
info: 闲聊-玩家长期未进行的行为反馈-1003乐福_单一闲聊

content:
Haven't seen you wielding your mattock,
blazing trails like you used to!
I get it though - there's so many new things pulling me in different directions too.
info: 闲聊-玩家长期未进行的行为反馈-1003乐福_单一闲聊

content:
I can't find my dream catcher,
could I borrow your insect net?{短暂停}Sorry,
and here I thought I was getting more clear-headed lately.
info: 闲聊-玩家长期未进行的行为反馈-1003乐福_单一闲聊

content:
The little extras on the beach are sunbathing,
I see crabs boldly rolling onto their backs,
and scallops waving their shells as if about to take flight,
info: 闲聊-玩家长期未进行的行为反馈-1003乐福_单一闲聊

content:
Haven't seen you pick up that dangerous tool in a while,
What's it called again... a mattock?
It'll get rusty if you don't use it for too long.
info: 闲聊-玩家长期未进行的行为反馈-1003乐福_单一闲聊

content:
The Wave Guardians watch over the tide's goal,
Eagerly awaiting visitors to join their play,
And sometimes, why not frolic with the sea creatures too?
info: 闲聊-玩家长期未进行的行为反馈-1003乐福_单一闲聊

content:
Haven't seen you playing with your fish performers in a while,
Are they not cooperating with you?
Or maybe it's time to switch up your show props?
info: 闲聊-玩家长期未进行的行为反馈-1003乐福_单一闲聊

content:
When the weather is nice,
I like to take my insect net out to air in the sun.
Don't you think insect nets look just like spider webs?
info: 闲聊-玩家长期未进行的行为反馈-1003乐福_单一闲聊

content:
But while spider webs catch tiny bugs,
we also catch spiders in our nets.
{打哈欠}Did I just doze off?
info: 闲聊-玩家长期未进行的行为反馈-1003乐福_单一闲聊
